parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
A light flashing forth (from), radiation, gleam. From a compound of apo and augazo; an off-flash, i.e. Effulgence.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From the base of dokeo; glory, in a wide application.
And, even, also, namely.
From the same as charax; a graver, i.e. engraving, the figure stamped, i.e. An exact copy or representation).
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From a compound of hupo and histemi; a setting under, i.e. concretely, essence, or abstractly, assurance.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To carry, bear, bring; I conduct, lead; perhaps: I make publicly known. A primary verb.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From dunamai; force; specially, miraculous power.
From rheo; an utterance, ; by implication, a matter or topic; with a negative naught whatever.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
From katharizo; a washing off, i.e. ablution, expiation.
From hamartano; a sin.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Another form for kathezomai; to seat down, i.e. Set; intransitively, to sit; figuratively, to settle.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
On the right hand, right hand, right. From dechomai; the right side or hand.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(divine) majesty, greatness. From megas; greatness, i.e. divinity.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
High, lofty. From hupsos; lofty.
